Description:
Kennington Class by the Water
BUILT and finished to a very high standard, this contemporary architect-designed Glenn Loddon family home has idyllic water views, a light, airy and open, split-level layout and so many extras you'll think it's Christmas all year round. The home's north-easterly aspect takes full advantage of the sun. An attractive low-maintenance garden surrounds the home with a dry riverbed a highlight. Polished Tasmanian oak floorboards and stairs add warmth and light to the interior. Subtle Duets' blinds fitted by Needlecraft let the daylight in and give the windows a clean, uncluttered look. Heating and cooling is zoned and via three refrigerated systems. Fitted with stainless steel smeg appliances, great storage, (built-in pantry, easy-glide drawers and much more), the kitchen is a dream. The island bench is finished with a granite overlay, has a breakfast bar, and water views. A meals area is adjacent and overlooks a large family room on the next level. Sliding doors open to a fabulous decked entertaining area, again with water views, and featuring a stylish leaf wall sculpture. Timber stairs lead to the main bedroom with its walk-in wardrobe, three-piece en suite and front row' balcony views. The owner has taken photos of the sunrise across Kennington Reservoir from his bed. At the far end of the home two more bedrooms, both with mirrored built-in wardrobes share a very large three-piece bathroom with spa bath. Ample laundry storage includes an in-built ironing board. The double garage has shelving, auto roller door plus the benefit of enough space at the entrance for a third vehicle. Other features include tinted windows, a ducted vacuum system, Crimsafe-style security doors, insulation, a gas assisted solar panel hot-water service and two rainwater tanks. Surround sound enhances television viewing and is wired to the deck and lounge room. Schools, shops, the uni, sportsfields and tennis courts are only minutes away. The extras are too numerous to mention so call the agent. He'll show you everything and prepare to be impressed.

Description:
When Location Counts
With low maintenance and a great location - this 2 bedroom unit is an ideal investment. The living area/ lounge room features a gas heater and a wall-mounted air-conditioner. The kitchen has good storage, a gas upright stove and plenty of room for a dining setting. Beyond here, the back porch area has been set up as a very handy home office, making great use of the available space. Both bedrooms are large and bright. One has a ceiling fan and both have built-in wardrobes. They share a 3 piece bathroom that includes a full-size bath. The single carport has easy driveway access, with an extra parking space beside it for visitors. A lockable steel storage shed adds to the convenience. The carport is also ideal for undercover entertaining and includes floodlights and space for a barbecue. This property is a definite "must-inspect" for your list.
Luke Goggin Real Estate - "We Get Results"

Description:
The Home that Keeps Giving
Located in a high profile leafy court within walking distance to Strath Village, the new Safeway complex, schools and University this magnificent 4 bedroom home in a blue chip location will impress from the moment you step inside the leadlight doors.
The features and benefits are outstanding both inside and out.
The Paul Crawford built home has 3 spacious living areas that suit all the family needs, and year round comfort is assured with ducted reverse cycle heating/ cooling throughout and ambient gas log fire. The cook of the house will enjoy creating in the kitchen that has had a full update with quality appliances.
This home offers a freshly updated ensuite to the main bedroom with a WIR, and the other 3 sizeable bedrooms have BIR's, all of which have ceiling fans.
Quality flooring is new through the home, and the family bathroom is also fully renovated.
Imagine yourself entertaining in the warmer months with the huge outdoor living area, with under cover decks and salt chlorinated in ground pool.
The large back yard has a shed with concrete floor for the handyman, with rear access for the boat, caravan or trailer.
Inspection of this home will not disappoint those looking for a comfortable home, and one that you simply just need to move your furniture into.
Judy-Ann Cantwell

Description:
Prime Position and Immaculate
Situated conveniently in one of Bendigo's most popular suburbs within walking distance to the CBD is this impressive two bedroom brick veneer unit. Easy access to local schools, La Trobe University and recreational facilities also highlights why this property is sure to be popular amongst investors who understand the benefits of purchasing in this area with excellent potential for strong growth. The residence comprises 2 spacious bedrooms with built in robes along with an open plan design incorporating a good sized living space adjoining the kitchen/meals area. Split system heating/cooling to ensure year round comfort and single lock-up garage for secure off-street car-parking. Short settlement is available for those looking to move straight in.
Darryn O'Keefe : 0418 509 563

Description:
LIGHT AND BRIGHT IN SOUGHT AFTER LOCATION
Superbly located in the heart of Kennington is this lovely three bedroom weatherboard home.
From the moment you walk through the front door you are wowed by the polish and presentation of this delightful property.
All three bedrooms are of a good size, two of which have new carpet and have been freshly painted.
Recently updated, the bathroom has a large vanity and a shower over the bath.
The kitchen has elec cooking and plenty of room for a large dining table. The home offers an abundance of cupboards and storage throughout, along with plenty of natural light, and for your comfort, split system heating and cooling plus a wall mounted air conditioner and space heater.
The large lounge area opens up through sliding doors onto a brilliant decked outdoor entertaining area.
Enjoy the immaculate gardens, both front and back, featuring a large pond with waterfall. There is also a large tradesman shed for the cars, boats and trailers, plus extra shedding for more storage.
Only 2km to the Bendigo Market Place and Train Station and a pleasant walk to the Strath Hill Shopping Complex, the bus is accessible at the bottom of the street, and there are three primary schools nearby plus La Trobe University.
This property will delight and is well worth an inspection.
Invest in a proven capital growth area.
Matt Gretgrix : 0438911688

Description:
“Investors Take note! 2 Houses = 2 Incomes”
Established and presented in a sought-after location, are these two homes on one title which are separately metered.
Both are leased to good tenants and bring in a combined income of $450 per week.
The main BV home to the front offers 3 bedrooms, separate meals and lounge area, with updated new kitchen and appliances.
Both heating and cooling is available, plus there is a 3 piece bathroom and separate toilet.
An extra rear room can be set up as study or potential 4th bedroom. The 2 bedroom cottage to the rear has features you would expect of a home of its era. Everything in the property is neatly presented with separate kitchen, lounge area, s/system heat/cool, bathroom, toilet and laundry.
Do the math on the return, because this is a rare opportunity to purchase and value-add long term.
Latrobe university, shopping centres, doctors and pharmacy are all a stone's throw away.
Nekti Tzouroutis : 0412 242 321

Description:
It's Got Heart - 1000m2 in Kennington.
The current owners built this home in 1956, it has had some changes along the way but what remains to this day is that it is still as great a family home as it was back then. Sitting perched on an elevated allotment of approx 1000m2 in the heart of Kennington and only a few minutes out of the centre of Bendigo. The home comprises three generous size bedrooms and a study, a spacious light filled lounge-room opening onto the front porch and a dining/sitting room, a well appointed kitchen, family bathroom and laundry. Split system heating and cooling. The backyard is huge with plenty of room for the kids or for future extensions etc plus two rain water tanks. This is an attractive original home with incredible potential, an ideal renovator in a fantastic location.

Description:
IDYLLIC IRKARA
New beginnings! This we offer as an affordable family home, or even a strong rental investment in one of the finest locations.
This spacious light-filled gem features high ceilings, family friendly floor plan with four spacious bedrooms, including a master suite featuring an ensuite, sizeable walk in robe and separate access to the timber decking / sun drenched sitting area.
A bright, large living and dining area, leads to the sliding door to access the outdoor entertaining area where you will find peace & tranquillity, in a private setting with the water feature quietly trickling in the background. Here you have the decking with built in spa - With a north facing aspect you overlook fruit trees, garden & backyard. The allotment is 759 sq.m - private from the front to the rear.
This beautiful residence offers free flowing spaces that make staying at home feel very relaxed. The kitchen and living spaces are well appointed & cater with efficiency and elegance when entertaining or simply enjoying these superb surroundings all to yourself.
Comfort is assured in all seasons with ducted gas heating, ducted evaporative cooling & fuel fireplace. All bedrooms also include ceiling fans.
The double garage surprisingly has a nook that offers a study / home office, an additional bonus to mention includes a sizeable working shed accessed from side gate, offering additional secure storage.
Bendigo's most appealing lifestyle attractions all lie within moments of this superbly built home. Kennington reservoir, La Trobe University, One Tree Hill, Bendigo CBD, quality schools. Whatever your intent or purpose, this flexible abode will welcome you home.
Bec Allen : 0438 528 091

Description:
FABULOUS KENNINGTON LOCALE
What a great style! 1950s Red Clinker Brick home situated on the high side of the Road, with lovely Street presence. Typical layout of separate lounge, separate dining room or 3rd bedroom, central bathroom and updated kitchen-meals. Bonuses include gas heater, as well as split system air conditioner and dishwasher. Outside is plenty of room, a single garage and a separate workshop which has light and power. Located a quick drive to the CBD, handy to Strath Village Shopping Centre, University and Zoned for Bendigo South East Secondary College.

Description:
CONVENIENT LOCATION - LARGE ALLOTMENT
Set on just over 1/4 acre is a solid three bedroom (plus study) home within walking distance to Strath Village shopping precinct and the Kennington Reservoir. All bedrooms are of a good size (two with BIR's), main with WIR and ensuite. The home also offers: formal lounge, separate dining, open plan kitchen/meals/family. Kitchen is spacious with walk-in pantry, new s/s appliances including: microwave, wall oven and hotplates. Split system heating and cooling plus a gas log fire in the lounge for all year comfort and plenty of storage.
To the left of the home is a double carport which allows you to drive through to a separate garage or workshop with concrete and power - suitable for an extra car or tradesman/handyman. The home has a great backyard for childrens' play equipment or even a pool! This home is at the end of a quiet court not far from public transport, uni and schools.
Don't hesitate with this one!
Sandi Dixon : 0418337275

Description:
PRESENTATION PLUS
You would expect nothing short of excellence when award winning McCarthy Homes builds a property. This Victorian Federation styled home encapsulates everything you could possibly want. Including four generous sized bedrooms all with built in robes. The Master; located at the front offers beautiful bay windows, a separate walk in robe and full ensuite with corner spa.
Hosting a formal lounge and a dining room - that could also be utilised as a home study. All with 9ft ceilings throughout. There is an amazing vaulted ceiling bulkhead in the open plan family meals area where the large expanse of windows fills this area with light and allows you to soak up the outdoors. All adding to the great sense of space. The well appointed highly functional kitchen hosts beautiful granite bench tops. A 3 piece family bathroom with separate toilet and powder room and large laundry are accessible from the bedroom wing of the house.
Entertaining is easy with a fully paved undercover outdoor pergola with garage access. Ducted heating and cooling provides year round comfort. Low maintenance landscaping all on an 880m2 (approx) allotment.
An easy walk to Strath Hill and Strath Village shopping centres, La Trobe University and Kennington Reservoir.
This magnificent home leaves you nothing to do but move in and enjoy!
Matt Leonard : 0418 502 633

Description:
Immaculate Family Home in Private Leafy Surrounds
Sale by Set Date 21/1/2014
Set back from the road in one of Bendigo's most sought after streets is this as-new two year old home on a huge 1272m2 block.
Accommodation includes four bedrooms with BIR's, the main of course, comes equipped with ensuite and large WIR and is cleverly positioned on the opposite side of the home to the other three bedrooms.
The open plan kitchen/dining/family area spills out through twin sliding doors to the timber lined Alfresco area, seamlessly bringing the outdoors inside, ideal for entertaining and alfresco dining.
The kitchen is equipped with all the mod cons, including caesarstone benchtops, starfire glass splashbacks, WIP and stainless steel appliances, including a 900mm freestanding oven and stove.
The second living area of the home is a huge formal lounge room, accessed from the spacious entry way and providing an ideal area for quick visits from guests whilst keeping the rest of the home private.
An oversized double garage provides plenty of extra room for storage and allows direct entry to the home or out to the immaculately landscaped backyard.
With too many additional features to list, such as ducted heating and cooling, tank water pumped to outdoor sprinkler systems and extensive storage, this home requires inspection to truly appreciate.
Jordan Gardner : 0477 277 530

Description:
It's All About The Location
Take a look at this - straight across from Strath Village Shopping Centre,
with over 30 specialty shops, a large food court, IGA liquor, post office & a hot bake. Close to schools, Kennington Reservoir, lush green parklands, and all your transport needs, with buses passing every 15 minutes. For sale now is this 2 bedroom unit with a single car garage & rear garden access through roller door. Single level living in a highly sought after location. Perfect for the downsizer, investor or an affordable entry into the market, this immaculate unit is positioned in a well maintained complex. 2 large bedrooms with BIRs, spacious lounge/ dining / kitchen, bathroom with shower and vanity, separate toilet & laundry. Additional features include a modern gas wall furnace, cooling, via a large split system air conditioner, ceiling fans in most rooms, and a courtyard garden that provides a sunny outlook. This property will appeal to many so inspect now!
Luke Goggin Real Estate. We Get Results

Description:
Fantastic Opportunity in a Brilliant Location
Whether you are an investor or first home buyer, it's hard to go past this opportunity!
With an easy walk to the Strathdale shopping centre, this spacious unit located in the popular Strathdale precinct and Kennington reserve is a hard one to go past.
Enjoying comfortable proportions and with plenty of scope for an upgrade, the interior comprises two spacious bedrooms with build in robes, bright open-plan living spaces with gas heating and air-conditioning, and a kitchen with electric cooking.
With street frontage, this unit is in a group of 3, and features a carport, garden shed and has a spacious enclosed yard.
Everything you need in a very desirable location.

Description:
Architectural Elegance
Water views, birdsong, top schools, excellent walking tracks and one of the best addresses in Bendigo; it doesn't get much better than this.
Then add perfect outdoor retreats, spa and pool, and a bespoke Russell Parsons home, and you have one of the most beautiful homes or a wonderful investment, all tied up in the prettiest of bows.
The gloss of parquetry floors greets you in the foyer, setting the scene for what's to come a contemporary home with four bedrooms, three living areas, two workshops, and a study.
The first floor hosts the master bedroom, formal sitting room and superb en suite.
The furnishings and fittings are first class, and of course there is ducted heating and cooling, ceiling fans and much more.
Take the short flight of stairs to the main floor and here is the hub of the home, the living areas open one into another, giving a feeling of light and space.
The blonde-wood kitchen has a built-in pantry, gas cooktop, dishwasher, and roller drawers. It overlooks the back garden and the barbecue area, so you can keep an eye on the kids as they play. The dining room is adjacent, and that too opens into a large family room or lounge.
Set on over 1000 square metres, there's so much to see at this property, you'll need to set aside a good amount of time, phone the agent and inspect it at a leisurely pace.
You can't help but be impressed with all there is on offer.

Description:
Charm, Character and Position
One of the original period homes in popular Kennington is now for sale!
The home includes three spacious bedrooms, main bedroom with ensuite, and both main and second bedroom with decorative open fire places.
Polished timber floors are a feature throughout.
The formal lounge has decorative cornices, open fireplace and a lovely leadlight window, plus the bathroom has been renovated.
The kitchen has got that country feel and includes plenty of bench space, great walk-in pantry, gas cooking and dishwasher.
The family room is at the back of the home and has a large split system.
Also for personal comfort, ducted heating has been installed.
Outside on the very large block, you will find a triple carport, lovely landscaped gardens and a large undercover pergola and deck area for those hot, BBQ months ahead.
The home oozes charm everywhere you look.
Close to schools and public transport, this property deserves your inspection now!
Adrian Robinson : 0408 389 680

Description:
POSITION, POTENTIAL - PERFECT !
Yes this 1940s Art-deco Californian bungalow has a host of original features including leadlight windows, ornate ceilings and cornices, original light fittings plus polished timber architraves and skirts.
The formal lounge has a superb open fire place, and a set of polished timber bi-fold doors, allowing the lounge to open up into the next room to create huge entertaining space. There are 3 bedrooms, bathroom and kitchen with a wonderful Waterford combustion wood stove, plus a gas oven and meals area with wall furnace. Outside the kitchen is a small vestibule or dining area, and the laundry plus 3rd bedroom, a large full width enclosed back porch overlooks the yard.
The back yard is large with a corrugated iron garage, wood shed and workshop at the very back of the property. Situated in an attractive quiet tree lined street opposite a Church on a large approx 812m2 allotment, walking distance to local shops, sporting facilities etc. And so close to the CBD.
This home has stacks of potential - whether restoring, extending or subdividing (STCA). So if you would like to take a step back in time, call Rod Grist on 5445 0069 or 0408 509 609 For a prompt and personal inspection.
Property Code: 1729

Description:
BE CHARMED
A character filled Victorian home in the heart of Kennington, a great location near recreational facilities and only a few minutes into the centre of Bendigo. This would make a fantastic first home, renovator or as it stands a fantastic investment property currently let to great tenants currently let until 23/05/2014.
Beautiful original features including front verandah, high ceilings and timber flooring it comprises three bedrooms, a separate lounge room and dining room plus a spacious updated kitchen/meals area, bathroom with shower bath and vanity.
There is ducted evaporative cooling and Gas heating for year round comfort.
Positioned on a low maintenance allotment with side access to a secure well fenced yard. This property is a great buy in a great location.

Description:
AN ADDRESS TO IMPRESS!
Located in the prime Kennington precinct & on the door step of the University, this spacious four bedroom home will surprise and delight you. The meticulous home on entry has a modern feel with feature tiling, a spacious master bedroom with impressive walk in robe and complete with his & hers double basin completing the ensuite.
Internal access from the double garage with noticeably quality features like 9ft ceilings, wide hallway, and neutral tones all inviting you through the home. With open cinema room to the right, the floor plan flows through to the large welcoming & fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, with its open plan feel this space will appeal! Additionally the home has three living areas including a formal lounge room, theatre room, open plan meals/kitchen area that flow through to the timber undercover alfresco - perfect for entertaining!
The bedrooms are substantial with BIRs & abundance of storage. The home has ducted gas heating & evaporative cooling. Outdoors no expense has been spared on the landscaping and the gardens are established, easy to care for & the perfect spot to entertain. Beautiful and stylish throughout!
Cameron Tweed : 0400 869 698

Description:
MODERN, STYLISH & COMPLETE
Awesome Investment - it doesn't get any easier than this! Why go through the hassles of building when all of the hard work has been done. Located in a quiet street this near new three bedroom home is ideal for the astute investor, first home buyer or young family! Its functional split level design comprises a spacious informal living room & dining area both overlooked by a modern kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances. An additional dining area or second living area is positioned at the front of the home. A private rear yard is low maintenance, safe and secure. The generous master bedroom features a walk-in robe and ensuite, step up past the living area towards two more bedrooms, each with built in robes and a main bathroom with separate toilet. Extras include reverse cycle heating & cooling, remote double garage & secure tenancy in place until August 2014. This home's been immaculately maintained over the years, and is presented to perfection! The location speaks for itself, tenant is to be applauded, inspection will impress!
Cameron Tweed : 0400 869 698
